mapper.insert: INSERT INTO functional_feedback (CREATOR_ID, CREATOR_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER_ID, MODIFIER_TYPE, MODIFY_TIME, TYPE, CONTENT, PICTURE_URL, PHONE, STATUS, USER_TYPE, USER_ID) VALUES (#{creatorId}, #{creatorType}, #{createTime}, #{modifierId}, #{modifierType}, #{modifyTime}, #{type}, #{content}, #{pictureUrl}, #{phone}, #{status}, #{userType}, #{userId})
